content: needles size 3mm designs 1 2 and 3 leg length 15 17 5 20 5 21 5 23 cm notes adjustable 6 7 8 8½ 9 in the yarn amounts stated are based on average requirements and are therefore approximate designs 4 and 5 important leg length 31 5 34 5 35 5 38 39 5 cm to ensure accuracy only king cole zig-zag adjustable 12½ 13½ 14 15 15½ in yarn is suitable no responsibility will be taken all styles for the result of using any other brand of yarn foot length 17 5 21 24 26 28 5 cm it is essential to work to the gauge stated adjustable 7 8¼ 9½ 10¼ 11¼ in knitted in king cole zig zag 4ply materials required design 1 shade 1251 waves and 1250 eton mess king cole zig-zag 4ply 100g balls design 2 shade 1252 rainbow design 3 shade 1247 mish mash designs 1 2 and 3 1 1 1 1 1 ball design 4 shade 1249 spring meadow designs 4 and 5 1 1 1 2 2 balls design 5 shade 1248 bilberry pie king cole ltd merrie mills union business park keighley road skipton north yorkshire england bd23 2qr website www kingcole com email enquiries@kingcole com tel +44 0 1756 703670 website kingcole com enquiries enquiries@kingcole com the designs in this pattern are copyrighted and must not be knitted for re-sale reproduction of this pattern is protected by copyright and is issued on the condition that it is used for non-commercial purposes © copyright king cole ltd 2021 socks_again indd 2 19/1/10 11 47 24
